comments.author: u279076@disabled.tld
comments.creator: u279076@disabled.tld
comments.raw_text:
https://litmus.mozilla.org/show_test.cgi?id=11351

According to the above testcase, blank tabs should be restored when clicking a link from an external application, but they are not.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a session with just a single blank tab
2. Save and Quit Firefox
3. Click a link from an external application (ie. Open Office, Thunderbird, etc)

Result:
When Firefox starts, it loads the page in a single tab (no blank tab is restored)

Is this expected? Is the testcase incorrect?
